data.name: Adrenaline 1:10,000 IV - 0.80 ml
data.instruction: Inform immediately if allergic type reactions occur.

data.name: Calcium Gluconate 10% IV - 4 ml
data.instruction: Monitor for adverse signs of bradycardia

data.name: Diazepam IV - 0.8 mg
data.instruction: If signs of overdose occur, stop the infusion immediately

data.name: Laparoscopy
data.instruction: Add acetaminophen through IV during the procedure

data.name: Spirometry
data.instruction: Patient must be observed & encouraged throughout the procedure
